bios.name: Len van Hoogenhuijze
bios.bio: Len manages our team of consultants, developing solutions for complex client requirements to ensure we meet their goals and objectives, delivering results on time. Len is experienced in Marketing Operations consultancy and ideally positioned to lead the team and help solve the challenges our client face.

bios.name: Joanna Mills
bios.bio: Joanna is responsible for all aspects of our Sales & Marketing from strategy development through to executing marketing activities and nurturing relationships. She is highly experienced in Marketing Operations and with a background in Client Services, is ideally positioned to look for solutions to the many complex requirements and challenges the modern marketer faces.

bios.name: Andrew Freeman
bios.bio: Andrew co-founded the company in 2000 and is responsible for the strategic direction of the business as well as maintaining close relationships with clients to ensure successful programme delivery. He leads CRMT Digital with a clear purpose to align clients’ sales and marketing processes to drive business revenue.

bios.name: Tony Sprague
bios.bio: Tony co-founded the company with Andrew in 2000. An executive-level technical specialist with substantial experience in Marketing Automation, CRM and business process management, Tony is a trusted advisor to all CRMT Digital’s clients.

bios.name: Alison Saunders
bios.bio: Alison Saunders manages our internal client teams and is responsible for developing and maintaining successful relationships with customers and prospects. She is highly experienced in marketing strategy and planning, so is ideally positioned to understand and advise on the many complex requirements and challenges our clients face.
